Posts.Content: Jan 11, 2012 04:41PM motherofyoungtwins wrote: I am in a simlar situation. I saw a breast specialist who found a mass that is painful, sore and swollen in my left breast. Did US and mammo saw nothing. She wants me to see a surgeon and referred me to a general surgeon whom I suppose to see tomorrow. I cancelled that appoinment and now waiting for an apponment with a breast specialist. Good Luck to you. Oh I pay out of pocket so I can't afford to see many doctors unless it is absolutely neccessary.
